description:
Make your presence known above the noise of traffic. A 120-decibel blast lets even the most inattentive driver know you’re right there. The horn goes on your handlebars, and the air reservoir fits in a water bottle cage or can be strapped to your bike frame.

  • Velcro-enclosed polyethylene bottle with a velcro strap for mounting
  • Squeeze the bottle to gauge the amount of air left
  • Refillable with a (Schrader) bike pump or compressor
  • Refill lasts for about 50 blasts
  • Volume switch regulates output volume
  • Works in winter to about -10°C
  • Includes 2 bar clamps to ensure proper fit
name: Samui Air Zound II Cycling Horn
